name: Electric Eric: Attack on Lake Pedder
name_original: Electric Eric: Attack on Lake Pedder
description:
Relive the battle the changed the Earth through the eyes of Eric Reece and fight to tarnish Lake Pedder.

Lake Pedder is an eyesore to this land. It is the last barricade preventing green energy from thriving and needs to be destroyed. Become Eric Reece, the 2^5nd premier of Tasmania and the sole survivor of the Lake Pedder war, in the fight to flood Lake Pedder, currently controlled by Prime Minister Gough Whitlam, armed with rotary propeller arms and dual stabilised rocket boots and the many aquatic goons he controls. Relive the tragic, brutal tale brought all the way from Australia through the eyes of the half-a-stack'nd premier of Tasmania.

Controls AD - Move WS - Adjust Aim SPACE - Jump LMB - Lightning Attack RMB - Special Attack ESC - Quit

Developers Notes:

Hello. I'm Ethan Munday. This is a game that I made solo. It's not my finest piece of work as I mainly entered this game jam to learn more about Unity 2D game making and to keep me involved with game development over the holidays. The entire premise of this game is incredibly silly and even if the game isn't the most polished, I hope you get a kick out of the epic battle of Eric Reece.
